text: Tu to jaanta hi hai ki wing me sabse jyada respect mai teri hi karta hoon. Auto me jo bola tha usse humesha inspiration leta rahoonga. Aise hi sabki problems solve karte rahiyo. Baki milte hai jaldi tere palace me XD. Bhoolna nahi
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: First year me achanak se ek banda Linguistics ke exam ke pehle mujhe confuse karta hai ki ma'am ne galat padhaya hai (tu sahi hi bola tha shayad). I am in awe of how you have done everything possible during your stay at IITK. Aise hi chaapte rehna and masti karte rehna
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: Yo fellow sports enthusiast. Fresher's inferno me tarref se leke IFL semis me haarne tak, bohot sports saath khele hai (and bohot baar teri team ko haraya hai, remember Inter wing final :p). I remember we sometimes got so competitve in wing football ki mast ladai bhi ki hai. Tennis, TT, football, badminton, squash sab saath khele hai. Those talks about the sports culture and what could be changed, about football and tennis matches and those times spent in the court will always be special. Aise hi khelte koodte raho. Cheers :) PS- Ek IFL jeetna reh gaya
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: Guruji namaste. You were one of the most down to earth people in our wing. Really enjoyed working together in the Sociology course. I remember discussing about the decoration in the OAT on Janmashtami. I also remember our discussion on how we should follow our passion and not enter the rat-race that is common. Really wanted to attend a session on "Hare Krishna" with you. Stay in touch.
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: Tumse inspiration liya hai kaise initiatives lene hai and life ko enjoy karte rehna hai. Mess me raat ke 3 baje chappal fekna was proof xD (still have to learn a lot from you). Lucknow me party lene aata hoon jaldi. Aur wo insta request accept ki ya nahi?
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: Yo Hinata (although tujhe Tsukki likhwana chahiye tha). Volleyball me smash to Hinata waale hi maarta tha tu(but jab bhi mai teri team me raha hoon us din haga hai tune). Kitni ladai ki hai CC ke room pe baithne ki jagah ke liye. Firse champions league dekhte hai saath, is baar stadium me. Cheers
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: Abhi tak badminton match nahi kiya tune (although ganda haara hota tu :p). Also abhi bhi hair-cut karta hai?
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: Thoda confusion kam kar and khul ke jiyo(applies to me also. But then, humara kafi similar journey raha iitk me). Call karte rehna taki saath me RR karte rahe. Baki best of luck in your pursuit of Physics. Nobel prize jeetna hai
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: Yo theory god. Thanks for all the help in the countless theory courses that we have now done together. Really enjoyed the projects on which we were working (until we got stuck :p). Hopefully we can collaborate even after you become world famous (which will happen soon). Bayern vs barca dekhne chalte hai saath kabhi (jisme barca jeetegi)
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: We had some good interactions, especially after the summer camp. Tera sense of humour bohot dark hai. Aise hi memes share karti rehna. Aur jaldi se shirt gift kardo mujhe :p Stay in touch
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: Spammer no spamming
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: Itni fast dribbling. Itna badiya footwork. Jab tu defender tha, tab second year me ek goal maara tha tujhe kata ke(Inferno final) , wo yaad rahega :p. Cheers to all the football matches
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: Chal pokemon pakadte hai. IITD me us walk pe kafi secrets bataye the maine but tum sab dhokebaaz nikle. Aise hi har sport me chaapte rehna.
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: Mess secy ban ke bohot Mast Kaam kiya tune. Thanks for the sandwiches. Also, kitni bhi baar subah uthaya tumhe, tu kabhi nahi utha xD
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: Thanks for selflessly helping whenever I asked you any doubts. Tere jaise chaapu ko dekh ke dar lagta tha pehle baat karne me. Glad I overcame my fear :p
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: Aree bhai. Behen ne rakhi baandhi thi tujhe to Tu saga hi hua. Wo kumbh ka trip and prayas ke interactions humesha yaad rahenge. Aise hi sabko inspire karte rehna. Baki srivar and aditya ke maze lene me bohot maza aaya. Milte hai jaldi
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: Sir, aapke sense of humour aur creativity ko bohot respect karta hoon mai. You were one of the funniest guys I have seen at IITK. We did not really interact much but hopefully future me kabhi milenge aur masti karenge. Also memes banane ki classes start karo. I'll be the first to enroll.
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: Humari football team ke defender. Kitni baar bolta tha tu ki striker khelna hai but team ka balance na bigde Isliye defence se hata nahi kabhi. Massive respect (mujhse nahi hoti defending :p). Thoda injure kam hua kar xD. Aur khul ke khaya kar, mota nahi hai tu
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: Amsterdam chalega?
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: Thanks for doing most of the group assignments ka 70% (baki 30 mera and 0 Srajit ka :p). Anime dekhna tere saath hi start kiya tha although Tu ab veteran ban chuka hai and mai still noob. Squash me tu mujhe nahi hara paya xD. Cheers to our awesome walks, sports competitions and philosophical discussions. Call kar liya jar
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: Thoda kam judge kiya kar
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: "Tum bhi IITK ke ho? Kaun sa department? Oh" :p. Humesha late karwaya hai tune, aalsi insaan. Cheers to all the exploration (especially jis  din crawling kestage pe aa gaye the). Firse kahi ghoomte hai. Dora ko le lenge plan banane ke liye
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: Abhi bhi rematch bacha hai :p
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: Spammer no spamming
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: Yo goalie. Kisi boring se boring topic pe tere saath discuss karna can become a memorable experience. And kutta jyada tez haath/pair hila sakta hai xD.
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: Yo prankster. Aise to bohot sakth banta hai but iron man ke marne pe pighal gaya tha XD. Wo email me deathnote ke spoiler de kar Accha n
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: Yo prankster. Aise to bohot sakth banta hai but iron man ke marne pe pighal gaya tha XD. Email pe deathnote ke spoiler de kar accha nahi kiya tune. Hala Madrid :p
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: poore ek saal mujhe jhelne ke liye shukriya :)
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: The total failure to keep your birthday party a surprise , thanks to JD and Vipul (birthday ke din bhi mujhse treat le li thi. Galat hua :p)
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: Hello discrete mathematician. Thanks for all the help in all the theory courses. Wish we can collaborate in the future too. Hopefully convocation offline hoga so that we can meet again at IITK
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: Badminton mast khelta hai tu
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: Apna shirtless badminton match was epic :p
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: Lets collaborate on some Quantum stuff? :p
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: Bhai ghoomne jao to invite karna mat bhoolna. Kafi inspire kiya hai tune(especially ki group assignments me fraud kaise maarna hota hai). Europe wala plan mat bhoolna. PM ko bhi ghaseet hi lenge. Jaldi milte hai. Bohot masti due hai abhi
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: Yo co-barca fan(football fan bolke izzat bacha lete hai abhi ke liye). Kafi irritate kiya hai tumhe. But bohot maze bhi kiye hai football dekhte hue and adventures(mess me band ho jata Tu ) karte hue. Champions league dekhne chalte hai kabhi saath
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: Summer camp me I found it really difficult to beat you (but haara nahi tha ek bhi baar :p). Continue karna chahiye tha baddy tujhe. Wapas khelte hai kabhi
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: IFL semi me dhoka nahi diye hiote to IFL apna hi tha :p. Galti se Chelsea na jeet jaye City se. Barbaadi ho jayegi.
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: Humesha har jagah invite karne ke liye thanks (sorry for mostly not coming). Summer camp ke din and fests ki masti would always remain special. PS - football mai better khelta hoon. Wo left se jo volley maara tha wo yaad rakhna
author: Rishabh  Batra

text: Mera memoir likhega ki nahi? Ab to tu thoda busy bhi kam hai xD
author: Rishabh  Batra
